description: Red Hot Cat's Tail (Acalypha hispida) is an amazing tropical evergreen shrub with a dramatic and striking display that is hard to beat. The plant has bright scarlet-colored catkins that grow in dense clusters, which stand out against the bright green foliage. The flowers create a stunning contrast of red and green, providing an incredible visual display. This gives the landscape an absolutely eye-catching appeal. Because of its hardy nature, drought tolerance, and ability to grow in various soil and light conditions, the Red Hot Cat's Tail is an excellent addition to any garden.
